content.rendered:
The Experts in Transportation Insurance
ONLINE RATER
Connect Your Clients to the Right Carriers
ONLINE RATER
Insurance For Truckers of All Types
ONLINE RATER
Appoint With TIE
Application

Personalized Service & Dedicated Teams

Get Appointed Today !

Our dedicated teams ensure a more personal approach to our agent partners. Quality service and faster quote turnaround times are the core of our values. Appoint today, partner with TIE, and experience the difference.

Appointment Request Form

THE TRANSPORTATION INSURANCE NETWORK

TIE’s insurance network and innovative programs provide insurance agents a competitive advantage when serving their customers.

REQUEST A QUOTE

The Insured

TIE insures long-haul freight carriers and both regional and local trucking companies.

Agents

Our agent partners connect with TIE to offer specialized insurance products to their clients.

TIE

TIE’s sole focus on transportation insurance makes us the experts in the industry.

Partners

TIE partners with carriers, data vendors, and insurance programs to create innovative solutions.

PRODUCTS

WE WANT WHEELS!

Transportation Insurance Experts offers a wide variety of insurance products across many business classes for your commercial auto insurance needs.
TIE works hard to provide the best insurance solutions for anything on the road, from light commercial to heavy trucking and even livery. TIE has a particular specialty in long-haul trucking insurance. From dry van risks to intermodal coverage to your last-mile needs, our markets can provide the coverage your insureds require that best fits their operations across the continental United States. Whether your business is big or small, TIE is your solution for hard-to-place accounts.

AUTO LIABILITY INSURANCE

We provide coverage for lawsuit-specific situations, new ventures, and rapid growth. Our portfolio of products includes multiple A-rated solutions. Our liability options offer flexibility for your preferred and distressed clients, from startups to established businesses.
Request A Quote

MOTOR TRUCK CARGO INSURANCE

Dry vans, refrigerated goods, flatbed commodities, intermodal containers, and hazmat operations all have a home at TIE. Our motor truck cargo markets allow our producers to work with your agent to provide the best possible value for the insured. Our limits range from $50K to $500K with admitted and non-admitted options.
Request A Quote

PHYSICAL DAMAGE INSURANCE

Whether it’s a one-unit risk or a fleet of 200 tractors, we offer options that include towing and storage limits, comprehensive and collision coverage, and extremely competitive rates in multiple markets to suit your customer’s needs.
Request A Quote

GENERAL LIABILITY INSURANCE

We offer a variety of A-rated general liability products, including a competitive GL option for those who haul for Amazon, intermodal containers, or other operations where your insured requires specific coverage.
Request A Quote

Hazmat Insurance

We provide coverage for lawsuit-specific situations, new ventures, and rapid growth. Our portfolio of products includes multiple A-rated solutions. Our liability options offer flexibility for your preferred and distressed clients, from startups to established businesses.
Request A Quote

Public Auto & Livery Insurance

Dry van, refrigerated goods, flatbed commodities, intermodal containers, and hazmat operations all have a home at TIE. Our motor truck cargo markets allow our producers to work with your agent to provide the best possible value for the insured. Our limits range from $50K to $500K with admitted and non-admitted options.
Request A Quote

Transportation Pollution Insurance (TPL)

Whether it’s a one-unit risk or a fleet of 200 tractors, we offer options that include towing and storage limits, comprehensive and collision coverage, and extremely competitive rates in multiple markets to suit your customer’s needs.
Request A Quote

Excess Liability Insurance

We offer a variety of A-rated general liability products, including a competitive GL option for those who haul for Amazon, intermodal containers, or other operations where your insured requires specific coverage.
Request A Quote

We offer a variety of A-rated general liability products, including a competitive GL option for those who haul for Amazon, intermodal containers, or other operations where your insured requires specific coverage.
Request A Quote

ABOUT TIE

Transportation Insurance Experts is a full-service, managing general agency and wholesale insurance broker.

A combination of insurance and transportation industry veterans founded TIE in 2015. Headquartered in new offices in Atlanta, TIE specializes in transportation insurance with a particular concentration in long-haul trucking insurance. We are rapidly growing, adding both new markets and agency partners.

We strive to provide best-in-class service, along with industry-leading transportation insurance expertise. We run our own proprietary in-house insurance programs and partner with some of the best insurance carriers in the industry to ensure the best experience for you and your customer. We blend international reach with exceptional local service.

Current Industry Affiliations

Meet Our Executive Team
